description.value:
This rune prevents enemies from escaping your grasp by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] to other planes.

When you critically hit a target with a weapon with the anchoring rune, the weapon casts 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dimensional Anchor] on the target (@Check[type:will|dc:38|name:Dimensional Anchor]{DC 38 Will}, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+28 #counteract]]{+28}), except that if the target critically succeeds at its Will save, instead of having no effect, the dimensional anchor lasts for 1 round. When you hit a target with the weapon but don't critically hit, the target is affected by 4th-level dimensional anchor for 1 round without a save (this still uses a counteract modifier of +28).

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
